name: Nike
description: American multinational corporation that designs, develops, and sells athletic footwear, apparel, equipment, and accessories.

name: Adidas
description: German multinational corporation that designs and manufactures shoes, clothing and accessories.

name: Gucci
description: Italian luxury brand of fashion and leather goods, part of the Gucci Group, which is owned by the French holding company Kering.

name: Prada
description: Italian luxury fashion house specializing in leather handbags, travel accessories, shoes, ready-to-wear, perfumes and other fashion accessories.

name: Chanel
description: French luxury fashion house that specializes in haute couture, ready-to-wear, handbags, perfumery, and cosmetics.

name: Louis Vuitton
description: French fashion house and luxury goods company that produces a wide range of products, including leather goods, handbags, trunks, shoes, watches, jewelry, and accessories.

name: Hermes
description: French luxury goods manufacturer that specializes in leather, lifestyle accessories, home furnishings, perfumery, jewelry, watches and ready-to-wear.

name: Burberry
description: British luxury fashion house that designs and manufactures ready-to-wear outerwear, fashion accessories, fragrances, sunglasses, and cosmetics.

name: Tom Ford
description: American fashion designer who previously served as the creative director of Gucci and Yves Saint Laurent.

name: Yves Saint Laurent
description: French luxury fashion house that designs and produces a wide range of luxury goods, including ready-to-wear, leather goods, shoes, and accessories.

name: Versace
description: Italian luxury fashion house that produces ready-to-wear, accessories, fragrances, and home furnishings.

name: Dior
description: French luxury goods company that designs and manufactures fashion apparel, jewelry, watches, fragrances, and skin care products.

name: Alexander McQueen
description: British luxury fashion house that designs and produces ready-to-wear, accessories, and fragrances.

name: Givenchy
description: French luxury fashion and perfume house that produces clothing, accessories, and perfumes.

name: Balenciaga
description: Spanish luxury fashion house that designs and produces ready-to-wear clothing, handbags, shoes, and accessories.

name: Fendi
description: Italian luxury fashion house that produces ready-to-wear, leather goods, shoes, fragrances, eyewear, timepieces, and accessories.

name: Ralph Lauren
description: American fashion designer, philanthropist, and business executive, known for his Polo Ralph Lauren clothing brand.

name: Calvin Klein
description: American fashion designer who founded the Calvin Klein clothing brand.

name: GAP
description: American worldwide clothing and accessories retailer that sells casual clothing, accessories, and personal care products for men, women, and children.

name: Levi's
description: American clothing company known worldwide for its Levi's brand of denim jeans.
